column4: is there a quick way to get openssh server running on the 10.04 livecd? i figured i'd just apt-get it, but that fails telling me to run apt-get update, and that fails too
well, i'm looking for the server, so that would be 'apt-get install openssh-server' ...but as i said, i tried that
its a metapackage for client and server.  its the only thing that works when running from live
oh, ok. i'll try that meta package then
